rukus.text: 97|1|pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban banhchouh kompir kuor an nowknong  yb a l k d  .
97|2|haey tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha  yb a l k d  chea avei noh
97|3|yb a l k d  noh ku brasaer cheang muoy pean khe  .
97|4|mea la ai kat cheachraen  ning chi pri l choh mk knong yb noh daoy  mean karoanounhnhat pi mcheasa robsa puokke  daembi anouvotd real batobanhchea .
97|5|nowknong yb noh der  porpenh tow daoy sechakdeisokh sa ndi pheap rhautadl hva cheu rlech laeng  .
